macOS 10.0+

```
class IOGeneralMemoryDescriptor : IOMemoryDescriptor
```

### [Descriptors](/documentation/kernel/iogeneralmemorydescriptor#descriptors)

[`IOBufferMemoryDescriptor`](/documentation/kernel/iobuffermemorydescriptor)A simple memory descriptor that allocates its own buffer memory.[`IODeviceMemory`](/documentation/kernel/iodevicememory)An IOMemoryDescriptor used for device physical memory ranges.[`IOInterleavedMemoryDescriptor`](/documentation/kernel/iointerleavedmemorydescriptor)The IOInterleavedMemoryDescriptor object describes a memory area made up of portions of several other IOMemoryDescriptors.[`IOMultiMemoryDescriptor`](/documentation/kernel/iomultimemorydescriptor)The IOMultiMemoryDescriptor object describes a memory area made up of several other IOMemoryDescriptors.[`IOSubMemoryDescriptor`](/documentation/kernel/iosubmemorydescriptor)The IOSubMemoryDescriptor object describes a memory area made up of a portion of another IOMemoryDescriptor.[`IOMemoryDescriptor`](/documentation/kernel/iomemorydescriptor)An abstract base class that defines common methods for describing physical or virtual memory.
